solution_line_template: He wants to buy a ${game_cost} game and ${candy_cost} of candy so {game_cost} + {candy_cost} = $<<{game_cost}+{candy_cost}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}

He will make ${babysitting_rate} per hour of babysitting and will work {babysitting_hours} hours so {babysitting_rate} * {babysitting_hours} = $<<{babysitting_rate}*{babysitting_hours}={total_earned}>>{total_earned}
He made ${total_earned} and spent ${total_spent} so {total_earned}-{total_spent} = $<<{total_earned}-{total_spent}={money_left}>>{money_left} left over
